snippet: Thousands of fans lined up for hours in midsummer heat in Madrid to pay their respects and mourn the great Real Madrid player Alfredo Di Stéfano.
abstract: Thousands of fans line up for hours in midsummer heat in Madrid to pay their respects and mourn the great Real Madrid player Alfredo Di Stefano; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of fans lined up for hours in midsummer heat in Madrid to pay their respects and mourn the great Real Madrid player Alfredo Di Stéfano.

headline.print_headline: Fans Pay Respects to Di Stéfano
